title: How to Decorate a Romantic Room

steps.headline: If you have an underneath to your bed, use it!
steps.description: Don't stuff things under the bed. Put things in old shoe boxes then carefully put them under in an organized manner. Do keep a room freshener inside that box or cupboard.

steps.headline: Pick out sheets with soft pastel or deep red or purple colors.
steps.description: Make sure that it complement with the curtains, furniture and wall color.

steps.headline: Don't paint your walls.
steps.description: Instead put colorful pictures, paintings, and posters on your walls. These pictures can be your originally clicked photographs of beach side or a lovely swimming pool side or your family, or any such thing which is your dream fulfilled or unfulfilled desire which you want to be closely associated with.

steps.headline: Try flowers.
steps.description: Flowers craft stores have lots of artificial colorful flowers place these around the room.

steps.headline: Lighting effect: You can have the both lights the bright light and the soft or dim light too.
steps.description: this will create an atmosphere. You can even use lamp shades near your bed side. Or also the ceiling lightning can also work wonders.

steps.headline: Do remember to have a comfortable mattress.
Make sure you have a clean room commit to cleaning it or it won't look romantic.
Make sure that you don't copy other romantic rooms because it won't be you, it will bore you, it won't be your room you can look at pictures for ideas.
steps.description: If you love your room for sure you will have thousands of ideas to brighten up your room.

steps.headline: If you have have large containment units, cover them with table cloths.
steps.description: This will create the illusion of a table.

text: If you have an underneath to your bed, use it! Don't stuff things under the bed. Put things in old shoe boxes then carefully put them under in an organized manner. Do keep a room freshener inside that box or cupboard. Pick out sheets with soft pastel or deep red or purple colors. Make sure that it complement with the curtains, furniture and wall color. Don't paint your walls. Instead put colorful pictures, paintings, and posters on your walls. These pictures can be your originally clicked photographs of beach side or a lovely swimming pool side or your family, or any such thing which is your dream fulfilled or unfulfilled desire which you want to be closely associated with. Try flowers. Flowers craft stores have lots of artificial colorful flowers place these around the room. Make use of aromatic candles. These candles will work wonders. Lighting effect: You can have the both lights the bright light and the soft or dim light too. this will create an atmosphere. You can even use lamp shades near your bed side. Or also the ceiling lightning can also work wonders. Do remember to have a comfortable mattress.  Make sure you have a clean room commit to cleaning it or it won't look romantic.  Make sure that you don't copy other romantic rooms because it won't be you, it will bore you, it won't be your room you can look at pictures for ideas. If you love your room for sure you will have thousands of ideas to brighten up your room. If you have have large containment units, cover them with table cloths. This will create the illusion of a table.
